attributes.action: Put a stop to the 2 tier health system where Welsh residents recieve free prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please back this petition to stop residents of Wales from recieveing free prescriptions while the rest of the UK has to pay £6.65 per item. We should all ether pay or all recieve free prescriptions. We are all citizens of the United Kingdom and where you reside in the country should not determine the cost of health care offered by the NHS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
